bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.models

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.tu_varna.sit.oop1.models.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    The Student class represents a student with attributes name, faculty number, program, year, group, status. It also maintains a record of the student's grades and an attribute average grade

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Student

        public Student(int facultyNumber,
               java.lang.String name,
               Program program,
               int year,
               int group)
        throws StudentException
        Constructs a new Student with the specified name, faculty number, program, year, and group.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the student.
        facultyNumber - The faculty number of the student.
        program - The program in which the student is enrolled.
        year - The current year of study of the student.
        group - The group number of the student.
        Throws:
        StudentException - if any parameter validation fails.

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getAverageGrade

        public java.lang.String getAverageGrade()
        Gets the average grade of the student.
        Returns:
        the average grade.

      • setAverageGrade

        public void setAverageGrade()
        Sets the average grade of the student. The average grade is computed by calculateAverageGrade() and is formatted to two decimal places.

      • getGradesBySubject

        public java.util.Map<Subject,java.lang.Double> getGradesBySubject()
        Gets the grade of each enrolled subject.
        Returns:
        Map containing the grade for each enrolled subject.

      • setGradesBySubject

        Sets the grades of the student.
        Parameters:
        gradesBySubject - the grades by subject map that needs to set.

      • calculateAverageGrade

        private double calculateAverageGrade()
        Calculates the average grade of the student based on the recorded grades in the gradesBySubject map.
        Returns:
        The average grade.
